# appIntent

**Instance Property**

The `AppIntent` that triggered scene creation `AppIntentSceneDelegate.scene(_:willPerform:)` will always be called after scene connection

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var appIntent: (any UISceneAppIntent)? { get }
```
title: appIntent
